description: Frontend User Interface implementation tasks using React, Next.js, or Vue

required_deliverables.description: Browser screenshot showing implemented UI (via ChromeDevTools or /visual-review)
required_deliverables.failure_message: Browser screenshot missing - cannot verify UI implementation

required_deliverables.description: Build must succeed (npm/yarn/pnpm build, exit code 0)
required_deliverables.failure_message: Build failed - code does not compile or has errors

required_deliverables.description: Component tests must pass (React Testing Library, Vitest, Jest)
required_deliverables.failure_message: Component tests failed or were not run

required_deliverables.description: Accessibility testing with axe-core or Lighthouse
checks: Keyboard navigation works for all interactive elements
required_deliverables.failure_message: Accessibility not verified - missing ARIA or audit
/visual-review was not run - MANDATORY for production UIs

required_deliverables.description: Browser console must have no errors (ChromeDevTools MCP)
required_deliverables.failure_message: Browser console has errors - fix before production

notes: ALL deliverables are REQUIRED for frontend-ui tasks
ChromeDevTools MCP must be used for browser screenshot + console verification
Screenshot Diff will be added in Stage 3 Week 5
Behavioral Oracles (Playwright automation) will be added in Stage 2 Week 4
